name: Virus Hack
description:
Use your arrow keys to move the rectangle and block the enemies from getting past. See how many you can block!

"Virus Hack" is my first solo-made game, created by following along with Dr. Sky Anderson's YouTube class: 10 Steps To Make Your Fist Game. Using Gamemaker Studio 2, the code is almost entirely Dr. Sky's. However, all of the assets are created by me! I also used FL Studio to make the music, but the song is my own chiptune arrangement of the Digimon Theme Song. While the game is rudimentary, it's published as a testament to my progress as a game developer.
